post.body: yeah being disconnected sucks... looks like you are having a fap-a-thon.
Ah - actually the funding part - I need to offload some tech to gain some tech - per the wife's rules. It makes sense - sort of. ;)
we are just stalking you - pay no attention ;)
U Can Haz Intarwebz?
emo is an anagram for moe which rhymes with hoe... so all you need now is a boat.
Yeah I'll wait for www.redbox.com
the only thing that was missing was you yelling "No Scope!"
the iphone version could based on some cache thing, not sure; just basing it off the search results - not updated yet on the iphone
nice - were the only 'good guy' firing? your partner seemed caught off guard.
i'm going to bring it up on the laptop instead - that one seems to work as expected. shaking fist at iphone.
hrm iphone having issues with this link, i'll have to figure out why... other youtube videos work fine but not this one. hrm....
it's like 3 for 3 on my predictions and still people want to do things their illogical way.
nope.
two that I know about ;)
hope you are bundled and well supplied!
if they are following you and you post text they will know. otherwise you need to append @ to each of their nicks.
welcome to the future.
growing more than ever; and rightly so.
as more criminals get desperate there will be a stronger need for security professionals.
secrets aren't secret if people don't know what secrets mean. this wasn't a secret - it was blown out of proportion.
oh that blows.. hopefully you'll get a newer replacement.
- easily influenced by silly things unimportant to the world at large. Huge amount of technology wasted on lame opinions ;)
yeah I could hang out there for a bit; just look over the new stuff - catch interesting conversations, play with stuff. always fun.
woot - Antivirus 360 infected system... lulz.
needing to get an imac for home and a mbp for travel... need to work out the logistics... hrm
bah too many viral activities today - I need to take a shower.
flash flood warning in orange county... it's been raining and raining.
hohoho - end users getting pwn3d by browsers telling users they have a virus... and offering a fix. <<< stop falling for this.
oh how i love last minute support calls on sunday nights...
time for breakfast... too much uptime this weekend.
iphone error: Youtube not available - however it seems there is a special way youtube for iphone works than for the normal user... hrm.
FREEDOM! - let the great nap begin!
JTR case 10089 39 days 1 hour 29 minutes 14 seconds : out of time. Bwha-bwha-bwha...
awake again. let today be a good day.
w00t tomorrow is the last day before the great nap!
mmmm 16 bean stew for dinner... DELICIOUS!
Watching "Bible Battles" on The History Channel - exploring the biblical world from a military perspective. Neato.
awake; tons of logs from the weekend of power failures from various sites... sigh.
watching some pre-recorded episodes of "wife swap": sweepstakes episode
needs coffee badly.
